segment.source: Rolling out Microsoft Intune policies
segment.target: Rolling out Microsoft Intune policies

segment.source: Rolling out Microsoft Intune policies
segment.target: Rolling out Microsoft Intune policies

segment.source: This topic provide specific recommendations for a phased rollout of policies in .
segment.target: This topic provide specific recommendations for a phased rollout of policies in .

segment.source: This approach applies to the first policies you apply in a new deployment, or policies you add to an existing deployment.
segment.target: This approach applies to the first policies you apply in a new deployment, or policies you add to an existing deployment.

segment.source: For general information about rollout phases, see Rollout phases for Microsoft Intune deployment.
segment.target: For general information about rollout phases, see Rollout phases for Microsoft Intune deployment.

segment.source: Phases of policy rollout
segment.target: Phases of policy rollout

segment.source: The phases of policy rollout are:
segment.target: The phases of policy rollout are:

segment.source: Project scope
segment.target: Project scope

segment.source: Proof of concept
segment.target: Proof of concept

segment.source: Pilot
segment.target: Pilot

segment.source: Enterprise rollout
segment.target: Enterprise rollout

segment.source: Operations and maintenance
segment.target: Operations and maintenance

segment.source: Project scope
segment.target: Project scope

segment.source: Define the scope of your policy deployment:
segment.target: Define the scope of your policy deployment:

segment.source: For a new implementation, this will require defining all of the desired device behaviors and security requirements that you want to create with your policy set.
segment.target: For a new implementation, this will require defining all of the desired device behaviors and security requirements that you want to create with your policy set.

segment.source: Decide what users and devices you want to impact with these policies.
segment.target: Decide what users and devices you want to impact with these policies.

segment.source: Design your user and device groups to enable you to apply the new policies appropriately.
segment.target: Design your user and device groups to enable you to apply the new policies appropriately.

segment.source: Determine whether there are limitations or requirements associated with each operating system that will affect the intentions of your policy.
segment.target: Determine whether there are limitations or requirements associated with each operating system that will affect the intentions of your policy.

segment.source: Consider policy design specifics, such as policy type and template to be used.
segment.target: Consider policy design specifics, such as policy type and template to be used.

segment.source: Whether you are launching your first set of policies or adding new policies to an existing policy set, consider how various policies interact, and what the likely device behavior will be.
segment.target: Whether you are launching your first set of policies or adding new policies to an existing policy set, consider how various policies interact, and what the likely device behavior will be.

segment.source: Issues with policy interactions and conflicts can be discovered in the Pilot phase, but catching policy conflicts in early planning will simplify execution of the Pilot.
segment.target: Issues with policy interactions and conflicts can be discovered in the Pilot phase, but catching policy conflicts in early planning will simplify execution of the Pilot.

segment.source: Proof of concept
segment.target: Proof of concept

segment.source: In the Proof of concept phase, test your policy deployment in a laboratory environment on devices and users that you've configured strictly for testing purposes.
segment.target: In the Proof of concept phase, test your policy deployment in a laboratory environment on devices and users that you've configured strictly for testing purposes.

segment.source: Have your help desk participate in this phase to learn what issues can arise during pilot and production deployment.
segment.target: Have your help desk participate in this phase to learn what issues can arise during pilot and production deployment.

segment.source: Troubleshooting information is available in Troubleshoot policies in Microsoft Intune - deleted.
segment.target: Troubleshooting information is available in Troubleshoot policies in Microsoft Intune - deleted.

segment.source: At this point in the process you should develop communication plans for pilot and production users.
segment.target: At this point in the process you should develop communication plans for pilot and production users.

segment.source: At a minimum the plan should include what device behaviors will change and when, and the business purpose for the change, and what to do if they encounter issues, both self-help information and how to contact the help desk.
segment.target: At a minimum the plan should include what device behaviors will change and when, and the business purpose for the change, and what to do if they encounter issues, both self-help information and how to contact the help desk.

segment.source: Pilot
segment.target: Pilot

segment.source: During the pilot you will deploy the policy to a small group of test users and devices.
segment.target: During the pilot you will deploy the policy to a small group of test users and devices.

segment.source: There are specific considerations for piloting policy in :
segment.target: There are specific considerations for piloting policy in :

segment.source: The test group should be representative of the group to which the policy will be applied for production rollout.
segment.target: The test group should be representative of the group to which the policy will be applied for production rollout.

segment.source: Educate the help desk regarding the changes in policy, and ensure they are prepared to help users in the test group.
segment.target: Educate the help desk regarding the changes in policy, and ensure they are prepared to help users in the test group.

segment.source: Activate your pilot user communication plan.
segment.target: Activate your pilot user communication plan.

segment.source: The pilot can first be done in isolated mode, where the device is not subject to other policies that may cause conflict and unintended behavior.
segment.target: The pilot can first be done in isolated mode, where the device is not subject to other policies that may cause conflict and unintended behavior.

segment.source: The final test must consider the new policy and all the existing policies that will be applied to the same device.
segment.target: The final test must consider the new policy and all the existing policies that will be applied to the same device.

segment.source: Enterprise rollout
segment.target: Enterprise rollout

segment.source: Based on the results of the pilot, adjust your planned policy to correct for policy conflicts and unanticipated behavior.
segment.target: Based on the results of the pilot, adjust your planned policy to correct for policy conflicts and unanticipated behavior.

segment.source: Notify your help desk of the enterprise rollout schedule.
segment.target: Notify your help desk of the enterprise rollout schedule.

segment.source: Have mechanisms in place to respond to help requests, and to adjust the rollout as necessary.
segment.target: Have mechanisms in place to respond to help requests, and to adjust the rollout as necessary.

segment.source: Be prepared to troubleshoot the policy if issues arise.
segment.target: Be prepared to troubleshoot the policy if issues arise.

segment.source: Activate your production user communication plan.
segment.target: Activate your production user communication plan.

segment.source: Apply the policies incrementally to additional groups, monitoring the policy state for affected devices and tracking help desk requests that may be related to the new policy.
segment.target: Apply the policies incrementally to additional groups, monitoring the policy state for affected devices and tracking help desk requests that may be related to the new policy.

segment.source: Operations and maintenance
segment.target: Operations and maintenance

segment.source: Operations: Monitor your console for alerts and user or device issues, and to ensure that polices are performing according to your organizational plan.
segment.target: Operations: Monitor your console for alerts and user or device issues, and to ensure that polices are performing according to your organizational plan.

segment.source: Help desk: Ensure that your help desk is aware of any changes to policies that will affect the user experience, as these may result in support requests.
segment.target: Help desk: Ensure that your help desk is aware of any changes to policies that will affect the user experience, as these may result in support requests.

segment.source: See Also
segment.target: See Also

segment.source: Troubleshoot policies in Microsoft Intune - deleted
segment.target: Troubleshoot policies in Microsoft Intune - deleted

segment.source: Use policies to manage computers and mobile devices with Microsoft Intune
segment.target: Use policies to manage computers and mobile devices with Microsoft Intune
